originalText.text: Dr. Lauer is amazing! He is knowledgeable and patient, and I am so happy that I chose him for surgery I needed. He truly cares about his patients and takes the time to address any of my issues. Aryeh at the front desk is also nice and super helpful. So happy with them! I would definitely recommend Dr. Lauer!

text.text: Dr. Lauer is amazing! He is knowledgeable and patient, and I am so happy that I chose him for surgery I needed. He truly cares about his patients and takes the time to address any of my issues. Aryeh at the front desk is also nice and super helpful. So happy with them! I would definitely recommend Dr. Lauer!

originalText.text: He is an excellent dr. I saw the bizarre review posted with one star which is why I am doing my first dr review.  This doctor saved my sight, my eye and kept me from looking deformed after an intricate surgery on my eye lid for a growth. He is also very kind and respectful to his office staff and came highly recommended by my eye doctor. He is very conscientious and I was very upset to see the whacky review that  was posted and not reflective of what a great doctor he is. I wish all drs were as good and as kind as Dr. Lauer.
